law.catch_line: Payment Of Salaries And Expenses; Appropriation
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 27, 2011. Repealed by 2011, 3, Sec. 131.] There shall be allowed and paid, upon the approval of the commissioner, for salaries and for contingent expenses in connection with the establishment and maintenance of free employment offices, such sum as the general court may annually appropriate therefor.
